description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field Serum Tumor Markers.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SERUM_TMR_MARKERS_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Clinical Serum Tumor Markers.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unknown


Serum marker studies within normal limits


Alpha-fetoprotein (AFP) elevation


Beta-subunit of human chorionic gonadotropin (b-hCG) elevation


Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) elevation
